short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Commentarium is a Chrome extension that allows you to add comments to any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Beta Version: As Commentarium is in beta, we’re keen on improving. You may see changes or encounter bugs. Share your feedback or report issues on our GitHub discussions page.


Explore Commentarium: Elevate your browsing with this Chrome extension. It allows for insightful discussions directly on webpages. Comment, vote, and engage with content effortlessly, using Google Sign-In for a quick and secure registration process.

Features Include:

Interactive Comments: Share your thoughts and engage with others on any site.
Voting System: Highlight the most insightful comments with your votes.
Ease of Use: Navigate easily thanks to our intuitive design.
Secure Authentication: Register and sign in quickly with Google Sign-In, ensuring your privacy and security.


Join Our Community: Contribute to enriching the web’s content. Your insights can lead discussions and bring perspectives to the forefront of any webpage.

Be part of Commentarium’s journey to transform web interaction.
